Alias.description: Indicates the name of the output data metric. This name appears as the column name for the metric on the attribution output table.

AttribModelStageId.description: Unique identifier that refers to the attribution configuration stage that uses this metric.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Three letter ISO currency codes for supported currencies. The default value is USD. This is an optional field.

EngagementSignalMetricId.description: Unique identifier that refers to the engagement signal that defines this stage.

Name.description: The text label that identifies the attribution model stage metric.
